meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Daniel Jamie Rosler Brandon Brooks Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7671.

td.p: Dave Daniel, a retired security manager from Shelley, Idaho
Jamie Rosler, an event host from Brooklyn, New York
Brandon Brooks, an HR manager from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,801)

tr.td: NOT CLOSE ENOUGH FOR JAZZ
LET THERE BE LIGHTING!
HANDY ADVICE
WORDS MADE UP OF ROMAN NUMERALS
THE SPANISH INQUISITION

Brandon
Jamie
Dave

2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Brandon
Jamie
Dave

(including 1 DD),
5 W
(including 2 DDs)
